2093080.name: Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack - Official Soundtrack
2093080.description:
Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack's official soundtrack, containing all the music found in the game (plus one track used in the teaser trailer). Over 1.5 hours of soothing, warm, analog, original music!

Composed and recorded on a Moog Grandmother, a Fender Stratocaster and a Levin acustic guitar.
Available in WAV (44.1kHz) and MP3 (320kbps) formats.
